item.description:
Xen'drik Expeditions returns to Pandemonium Books & Games in a frantic pair of super-weekends!


**Saturday, January 6**

Noon to 5 PM at the Dining Room table of Doooom - Well of Woe, Round 1 - Hosted by Andrew French

The prohecies of the Caldyn Fragments have pointed to the Well of Woe, and the four factions speed towards it. But can they work together to find out how to reach it? (All factions welcome.)

-

Noon to 5 PM in the Arena - Blackwheel Company Adventure 3: Marked Man - Hosted by Chris Senhouse

Join the Dragonamarked and their mercenaries as they work to uncover the next arc of draconic prohecies. (Blackwheel Company characters only.)

-

6 PM to 11 PM at the Dining Room of Doooom - Well of Woe, Round 2 - Hosted by Andrew French

You now hold the key to finding the Well of Woe, but can you survive long enough to claim it for your faction? (All factions welcome.)

-

6 PM to 11 PM in the Arena - Mere of Shattered Souls - Hosted by James Wnorowski

A new piece of the Caldyn Fragments falls into place. Can the four factions work together to meet their goals? (All factions welcome.)


********************************************************************

We can take 6 players per session, plus we take 2 alternates, who get the space if a player canceles or doesn't show. Please sign up by sending email to rpga [AT] bloopwatch [DOT] org

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: XenEx Panic Weekend @ Pandemonium Books
